Combat
Hit Points: 17 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1

Combat Notes:

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Defensive Duelist: Can use a reaction to gain +4 Armor Class when wielding a proficient finesse weapon
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 3; Constitution: -2; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 6; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 6
Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 2; K1: 1; W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 2 Attack: K: 7; W: 6 Spell DC: K: 15; W: 14
Spells:
Blink (W3 Tran): Self has a 50% chance of becoming ethereal at the end each turn, returning to a spot within 10' at the start of the next turn, for 1 min
Charm Person (K1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom negates) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cloudkill (W5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 2 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target increases a size category, gaining advantage on Strength checks and +1d4 HP weapon damage, or decreases a size category, suffering disadvantage on Strength checks and -1d4 HP weapon damage (save Constitution negates), for concentration up to 1 min; can instead target an unattended object
Feather Fall (W1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60' per rd for 1 min
Find Familiar (W1 Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in animal form that can deliver touch attacks when within 100' [R]
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Fire Shield (W4 Evoc): Self gains resistance to a choice of heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Leomund's Secret Chest (W4 Conj): Self can move a touched 12 cubic ft chest to and from the Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Light (W0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Mage Hand (W0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Circle (W3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Polymorph (W4 [Shapechanger] Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Scorching Ray (W2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Spider Climb (W2 Tran): Touched can crawl on walls and ceilings for concentration up to 1 hr
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of actions (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Stoneskin (W4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Telekinesis (W5 Tran): R60' Self can mentally move a 1000 lb object 30' per rd (save Strength negates) for concentration up to 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 warlock cantrips and can cast a chosen K1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 5 spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) at the end of a short rest once per long rest
Minor Alchemy: Can change the substance of 1 cubic foot of matter per 10 min effort for concentration up to 1 hr
Shapechanger: Knows the Polymorph spell; can transform self into a CR 1 creature once per short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Transmutation Savant: Can copy transmutation spells into spellbook for half cost
Transmuter's Stone: Can use an 8-hr process to create a stone that gives a choice of 60' darkvision, +10' Speed, proficiency on Constitution saves, or resistance to a chosen energy damage, and can change the effect of a possessed stone when casting a transmutation spell
